fog.config.option.fog_calculations.warni:
§6§l§nWarning!§r It is not recommended to touch these constants unless you understand what they do, and how they are used.
Consider leaving them as-is for the best experience.
fog.config.option.description.initial_fo: The initial (when the fog engine is loaded) distance from the camera at which fog starts to appear - expressed as a percentage of view distance
The initial (when the fog engine is loaded) distance from the camera at which fog is fully opaque - expressed as a percentage of view distance
fog.config.option.description.disable_ra: Disables the raininess effect, which makes the fog appear more dense when it is raining
fog.config.option.description.disable_un: Disables the underground fog multiplier, which makes the fog appear more dense and dark when the player is underground
fog.config.option.description.disable_bi: Disables the biome fog colour, which makes the fog colour change based on the biome the player is in
fog.config.option.description.disabled_d: Disables the fog modifications in the specified dimensions.
fog.config.option.description.disable_cl: Disables the cloud whitening effect, which unlinks cloud color from fog color. This is disabled when Sodium is present as Sodium does this by default.
fog.config.option.description.disable_mo: Disables the mod entirely, useful if you want to make comparisons to vanilla.
fog.config.option.description.fog_start_: Controls the speed at which the fog start distance transitions to new values. Lower values result in smoother transitions.
fog.config.option.description.fog_end_tr: Controls the speed at which the fog end distance transitions to new values. Lower values result in smoother transitions.
fog.config.option.description.darkness_t: Controls the speed at which darkness levels transition. Lower values result in smoother transitions.
fog.config.option.description.fog_color_: Controls the speed at which the fog color transitions to match environmental changes. Lower values result in smoother color changes.
fog.config.option.description.start_mult: Controls the speed at which the fog start multiplier transitions. Lower values result in smoother transitions.
fog.config.option.description.end_multip: Controls the speed at which the fog end multiplier transitions. Lower values result in smoother transitions.
fog.config.option.description.raininess_: Controls the speed at which raininess effects transition. Lower values result in smoother transitions.
fog.config.option.description.undergroun: Controls the speed at which underground fog effects transition. Lower values result in smoother transitions.
fog.command.toggle.enabled: Fog engine modifications have now been re-enabled.
fog.command.toggle.disabled: Fog engine modifications have now been disabled.
fog.command.reset: Fog engine modifications have been reloaded and reset to the default values specified in the config.
fog.command.debug.failure: An error occurred while getting debug information.
